TopicTitle: Kerbal War II: A history of Kerbalkind concerning the struggle of Ideologies

Articles.Content:
The last time I made a KWII thread, it was crumpled in the April 2013 apocalypse. So now, I begin rewriting it, but this time, it is (hopefully) more thorough and overall, not the Jeb-centered version back before the reset.

Anyway...

Description

The world was at the brink of a world war. The Zanistani Panzers are racing through minor countries, and the Hissans threatened the Seenuese territorial integrity and hope to devour the Pacific. The Vortanians remained reluctant, but the tide is changing. The territorial conquests and the responses pressed the world into an irreversible path of a war - a war that could've been avoided years earlier. Will the conquerors achieve a victory they could hope for - a cheap and complete victory? Or will the Free World unite and, as a whole, stand up against the wave of terror?

Chapters

  1. Preface 1: Treaty of Kersailles
  2. Preface 2: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly
  3. Preface 3: Great Depression
  4. Prologue 1: Rise of Totalitarianism
  5. Prologue 2: Appeasement, Isolationism, and Kroosevelt (Roosevelt)
  6. Prologue 3: Hissan invasion of Seenu
  7. Chapter 1: War Breaks out in Europa
  8. Chapter 2: Blitzkrieg
  9. ...

Notes on nationality: (this list is incomplete, if you can think of any Kerbalized names for nations in 1933-1945, let me know.

Zanistan (Germany)

Hissan Empire (Japan)

Seenu (China)

Vargrossa (Soviet Russia)

United Vortanian States (America)

Janida (Canada)

Nituras (Britain)

Retreta (France)

Credits

Twinky827 - Country names

In the meantime, new chapters soonTM.
